thread.title: ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 2.3% in August 2015Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 2.3% in August 2015Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 2.3% in August 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
ALTA Member Airlines Passenger Traffic Increased 2.3% in August 2015 Published on : Saturday, October 3, 2015
The Latin American and Caribbean Air Transport Association (ALTA) announced that its member airlines carried 16.0 million passengers in August, up 2.3% -or 357,000 additional passengers- from the previous year.
Traffic (RPK) grew 6.1% and capacity (ASK) increased 6.4%, bringing down the load factor to 80.6%, 0.2 percentage points lower than in August 2014.
Year-to-date, the number of passengers carried from January to August increased 5.3% versus the same period of the previous year, reaching 125.0 million passengers, or 6.3 million more passengers vs. January-August 2014. During the aforementioned period, traffic (RPK) rose 6.4%, capacity (ASK) increased 5.7%, and the passenger load factor reached 79.9%, 0.5 percentage points higher than the previous year.
Freight ton kilometers declined 8.7% in August and 7.5% year to date.
* International and domestic flights
